    public abstract class AbstractMessageManager<OID_T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,VDATA_T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,EDATA_T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,IN_MSG_T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,OUT_MSG_T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,GS_VID_T,GS_OID_T>
extends Object
implements GiraphMessageManager<OID_T,VDATA_T,EDATA_T,IN_MSG_T,OUT_MSG_T,GS_VID_T,GS_OID_T>
    skeletal implementation for giraph message manager. providing common utils for message store(cache).
